text: aur baaz log aise bhee hain jo khuda ke siva auron ko bhee khuda ka misal va shareek banaate hain (aur) jaisee mohabbat khuda se rakhanee chaahie vaisee hee un se rakhate hain aur jo log eemaanadaar hain vah un se kaheen badh kar khuda kee ulafat rakhate hain aur kaash zaalimon ko (is vakt) vah baat soojhatee jo azaab dekhane ke baad soojhegee ki yaqeenan har tarah kee qoovat khuda hee ko hai aur ye ki beshak khuda bada sakht azaab vaala hai
